title: Trump harnesses terrifying company - with a name straight from Lord of the Rings
description: Draw a circle around all the assets in America now devoted to Artificial Intelligence.Draw a second circle around all the assets devoted to the U.S. military.A third around all assets being devoted to helping the Trump regime collect and compile personal information on millions of Americans.And a fo...

title: Microsoft planning to ax thousands of sales jobs as focus shifts to AI: report
description: Microsoft is planning to cut thousands of jobs as part of a broader effort to streamline its workforce while ramping up investments in artificial intelligence.

title: Pope Leo says AI threatens humanity, 'poses challenges to human dignity'
description: Pope Leo XIV has issued a stark warning about artificial intelligence, declaring it a threat to humanity that demands urgent global action.

title: Amazon CEO says AI will reduce its corporate workforce in next few years
description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy anticipates generative artificial intelligence will reduce its corporate workforce in the next few years.

title: Can ChatGPT Help With Bill Negotiations? We Put It to the Test
description: Negotiate utility bills and bank fees with some help from artificial intelligence.

title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy admits AI will 'reduce' corporate workforce
description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy ominously warned Tuesday that he expects the rise of generative artificial intelligence to “reduce” the company’s corporate workforce in the next few years.

title: How to Boost Your Productivity With This AI Tool
description: Artificial intelligence can't clean and fold your laundry yet, but it can help you plan your housework schedule.

title: Elon Musk's xAI aims to raise $4.3B in equity funding: report
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence firm xAI is reportedly in talks to raise $4.3 billion in a new equity investment round.

title: OpenAI new recruiting head says 'unprecedented pressure to grow'
description: OpenAI's new recruiting head said the stakes are rising when it comes to recruiting artificial intelligence talent.

title: Meta Investors cheer as Mark Zuckerberg doubles down on AI commitment
description: Meta Platforms Inc. keeps writing bigger checks in pursuit of its artificial intelligence strategy, and traders keep cheering it on, encouraged that the expensive bets will keep paying off.
